name: ProthrombinTime
title: Prothrombin Time
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of  values contains laboratory tests that represent prothrombin time.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify a prothrombin time laboratory test. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the "Laboratory Test" category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include LOINC codes that identify prothrombin time.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
